agents.name: SlideCraft GPT
agents.description: Specialized in designing engaging and informative presentations, SlideCraft GPT utilizes AI to generate visually appealing slide layouts and graphics, perfectly suited for educational and professional settings.

agents.name: ScriptMaster GPT
agents.description: Expert in crafting compelling speech scripts, ScriptMaster GPT integrates advanced linguistic models to create clear, persuasive, and audience-appropriate speeches for various topics and occasions.

agents.name: BioVisual GPT
agents.description: Focused on biomedical visualization, BioVisual GPT uses AI to create detailed and accurate visual representations of biological concepts, aiding in education and research with high-quality diagrams and animations.
